name: Cascade
description: A service that configures a network of entities (products and NPEs) which propagate data through an arbitrarily shaped/sized hierarchy. Supports inheritance of properties from upstream to downstream entities, with configurable pointer properties and inheritance direction.

name: Non-Product Entity
description: An entity type in Salsify that is not a product but can participate in data inheritance hierarchies. NPEs have a type property and pointer properties that define relationships to other entities. Used in Cascade for propagating data through hierarchies alongside regular products.
